<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cavalier's Banner](/Feats.aspx?ID=1920) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 164 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919)

**Requirements**
You have pledged your service to a specific organization or ideal (see [Cavalier Pledges](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53) sidebar).

</column>

---

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).

<title level="2">Cavalier's Banner leads to...</title>
[Stalwart Standard](/Feats.aspx?ID=3620), [Wave the Flag](/Feats.aspx?ID=3621)
